attributes.action: Turn the london eye into a giant clock face.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
a plan to turn the London eyes clock face into a giant analogue clock.
To do this shouldn't be to difficult, have a series of lights running up each of the pod support struts, that are turned on and off displaying the clock hands. with this we would surely have one of the largest clocks in the world.
I don't think a second hand would be necessary.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
